input.sentences: there was a ceremony by the memorial today .
cadets were dressed in their finest uniforms .
bystanders and alumni saluted them as they marched past .
important people wanted to shake their hands .
output.sentences: Today I am in a sacred place observing a military ceremony.
You can see the soldiers are in their dress uniforms.
There are dignitaries here as well and they are respectful in their saluting and observance.
One of the high ranking dignitaries is being sure to shake some hands and speak with the soldiers, letting them know they are appreciated.
At the conclusion of the ceremony we show respect or our nation and military branches.
